problems.title: Determine Quadrant of a Point
problems.description:
Given coordinates (x, y) of a point, determine and print which quadrant it lies in.
- Quadrant I: x > 0 and y > 0
- Quadrant II: x < 0 and y > 0
- Quadrant III: x < 0 and y < 0
- Quadrant IV: x > 0 and y < 0
- Origin: x == 0 and y == 0 (print "Origin")
- On Axis: If x == 0 or y == 0 but not both (print "On Axis")

Input Format:
Two integers separated by space representing x and y coordinates.

Output Format:
Print "Quadrant I", "Quadrant II", "Quadrant III", "Quadrant IV", "Origin", or "On Axis".
problems.examples:
Sample Input
5 3

Sample Output
Quadrant I

Sample Input
-5 3

Sample Output
Quadrant II

Sample Input
0 0

Sample Output
Origin

Sample Input
0 5

Sample Output
On Axis

Explanation:
Use nested if-else to check signs of x and y coordinates.
hintsList: First check if both are zero (Origin), then check if either is zero (On Axis), then check signs of x and y to determine quadrant.
